languages.text: "Обойдемся без лишних трат. Никакого баловства, только то, что обеспечит им здоровье — еда, теплая одежда, тренировки".

traits.locale_text: "Обойдемся без лишних трат. Распорядись, чтобы техники сделали игрушки из ненужных деталей механизмов".

languages.text: "Nothing extravagant. No spoiling the children — only spend thrones on things that will keep them healthy: food, warm clothes, and training."
languages.original_text: "Обойдемся без лишних трат. Никакого баловства, только то, что обеспечит им здоровье — еда, теплая одежда, тренировки".

traits.locale_text: "Nothing extraneous. No spoiling the children — only spend thrones on things that will keep them healthy: food, warm clothes, and training."
"Nothing extraneous. No spoiling the children — only spend thrones on things that will keep them healthy: food, warm clothes, and training."
"Nothing extravagant. No spoiling the children — only spend thrones on things that will keep them healthy: food, warm clothes, and training."
"Nothing extravagant. No spoiling the children — only spend thrones on things that will keep them healthy: food, warm clothes, and training."
"Nothing extravagant. No spoiling the children — only spend thrones on things that will keep them healthy: food, warm clothes, and training."
"Nothing extravagant. No spoiling the children — only spend thrones on things that will keep them healthy: food, warm clothes, and training."
"Nothing extravagant. No spoiling the children — only spend thrones on things that will keep them healthy: food, warm clothes, and training."

languages.text: « Rien de trop dispendieux. Il ne s'agit pas de gâter ces enfants, juste de dépenser le strict nécessaire pour pourvoir à leurs besoins essentiels : vivres, vêtements chauds et instruction. »
languages.original_text: "Nothing extravagant. No spoiling the children — only spend thrones on things that will keep them healthy: food, warm clothes, and training."

traits.locale_text: « Rien de trop dispendieux. Il ne s'agit pas de gâter ces enfants, juste de dépenser le strict nécessaire pour pourvoir à leurs besoins essentiels : vivres, vêtements chauds et instruction. »

languages.text: «Nada de cosas extravagantes, no hay que consentir a los niños. Gaste los tronos en cosas para que estén sanos: comida, prendas de abrigo y entrenamiento».
languages.original_text: "Nothing extravagant. No spoiling the children — only spend thrones on things that will keep them healthy: food, warm clothes, and training."

traits.locale_text: «Nada de cosas extravagantes, no hay que consentir a los niños. Gaste los tronos en cosas para que estén sanos: comida, prendas de abrigo y entrenamiento».

languages.text: 「贅沢なものは不要だ。子供たちを甘やかさないように。子供たちの健康を維持するためのもの、つまり食べ物、暖かい服、そして訓練にだけスローンを使うべきだ」
languages.original_text: "Nothing extravagant. No spoiling the children — only spend thrones on things that will keep them healthy: food, warm clothes, and training."

traits.locale_text: 「贅沢なものは不要だ。子供たちを甘やかさないように。子供たちの健康を維持するためのもの、つまり食べ物、暖かい服、そして訓練にだけスローンを使うべきだ」

languages.text: “不要弄那些奢侈的东西，也不要溺爱那些孩子。把钱都花在能让他们保持健康的东西上，比如食物、暖和的衣服、训练等等。”
languages.original_text: "Nothing extravagant. No spoiling the children — only spend thrones on things that will keep them healthy: food, warm clothes, and training."

traits.locale_text: “不要弄那些奢侈的东西，也不要溺爱那些孩子。把钱都花在能让他们保持健康的东西上，比如食物、暖和的衣服、训练等等。”

languages.text: "Nichts Extravagantes. Verwöhnt die Kinder nicht ... gebt ihnen nur Dinge, die sie gesund halten: Lebensmittel, warme Kleidung und Training."
languages.original_text: "Nothing extravagant. No spoiling the children — only spend thrones on things that will keep them healthy: food, warm clothes, and training."

traits.locale_text: "Nichts Extravagantes. Verwöhnt die Kinder nicht ... gebt ihnen nur Dinge, die sie gesund halten: Lebensmittel, warme Kleidung und Training."
